quiz.question: A mayor must cut funds from education or healthcare. Utilitarian approach?
options: B) Prioritize what helps the most people
D) Cut neither and raise taxes
quiz.platoQuote: "The only freedom which deserves the name is that of pursuing our own good in our own way."

quiz.question: A soldier can save his comrades by deceiving the enemy. Utilitarian logic?
options: B) Deception if it minimizes suffering
quiz.platoQuote: "Originality is the one thing which unoriginal minds cannot feel the use of."
